pullRequest.title: Adding diagrams for auth.md reference, update auth.md
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add diagrams for the auth documentation to documentation/images and update documentation/auth.md to display these diagrams.
Refer to Github issue:
#264

commit.message: Adding images for auth.md reference, modifying auth.md to reference the new images

nodes.bodyText: The numbering of the steps in the diagram is a little confusing because there are several items labeled as step 1. I would also consider changing the written login flow to use a) b) c) type numbering instead of actual numbers to avoid the reader thinking those written steps correspond to the numbered steps in the diagram. This comment applies to all 3 diagrams and corresponding written steps.

nodes.bodyText: The text in the auth box seems to be missing some commas or other punctuation
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -117,14 +116,12 @@ Participants (mobile app users) are authenticated through the login method of th
 1.  A mobile app user is locked out of an account for 15 minutes after 5 incorrect password attempts  
 
 ### Participant Logout
-
-<!-- ![auth_mobile_logout.png](images/auth_mobile_logout.png "Mobile logout diagram") -->
+![alt_text](images/auth_mobile_logout.png "Mobile logout diagram")
 
 The mobile app sends a logout request to the Auth Server. The Auth Server then retrieves the access token from the request and clears the row in the sessions table, which has the access token.
 
 ### Validate Access Token
-
-<!-- ![auth_validate_token.png](images/auth_validate_token.png "Validate access token diagram") -->
+![alt_text](images/auth_validate_token.png "Validate access token diagram")

commit.message: Fixed images, added a new image and modified text/sections in the auth.md document

Formatting in auth.md

Adjusted the "Password Handling and Rules" section from a header to normal text.

nodes.bodyText: maybe add some heading or formatting to make this stand out, e.g. ** for bold?
